title: Bug 117981 - Unable to select any item in library outline view initially
description:
Description: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, it is not possible to do so on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item from the list.

Observed Behavior: When trying to select an item for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Expected Behavior: The selected item should stay focused and highlighted in the outline view when clicked on.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item from the list. It should not select on the first try, and the focus should jump to the library file node.
3. Repeat step 2, and this time the item should correctly select and stay focused.
